VALID_USERNAME: Username must be between 3 and 20 characters
NUMBE_CARAC_PASSWORD: The password must have at least 8 characters
MIN_PASSWORD: The password must contain at least one lowercase letter
MAJ_PASSWORD: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter
NUMBER_PASSWORD: The password must contain at least one number
SPECIAL_CARAC_PASSWORD: The password must contain at least one special character
RATE_LIMIT: Too many connection attempts, please try again later
EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Your Email has not been verified, please check your mailbox
SUCCESS_INSCRIPTION: you received an email to validate your account
EMAIL_FORGOT_PASSWORD: Email sent to reset your forgot password
VALIDATION_FORGOT_PASSWORD: Your password has been successfully updated
NAME_MIN_MAX_CARAC: The name must be between 5 and 50 characters long.
MESSAGE_MIN_MAX_CARAC: The message must be between 10 and 500 characters long.
